tab1.text1:
Welcome to noFear PvP NoWipe Cluster

Please claim your Free Starter Packs in the 'F2' menu.

http://discord.gg/JarwSJKKvZ Button @ Bottom left of this page

PvP maps (NoWipe) : TheIsland and all future map additions coming in later.

Cross Server cluster chat is enabled. Full global chat history in Discord (Once API is developped for plugins).

You can scroll these panels.
Buttons for each different sections in the corners

Important Notes:
You can use the obelisk or drop beacons to transfer between maps with your survivor (levels & engrams), items and dinos (Once more maps are added to the cluster).

Keep in mind that this server is hosted and there is a cost for it. All support/donations goes directly to the server management and hardware upgrades of enegy bills so those are greatly welcome.

Server admin : ZaRd

Do not hesitate if you have questions or need help in game you can always DM in discord or in-game [French/English] support will be provided.

[Admin Base]
Yes its raidable !! It will be defended and everything you get from it is yours without retaliation. Admin is allowed to defend with what he has in the base only no attacking unless someone is asking to get attacked but once 1st defense is breached, the raid is over for the admin.

tab2.text1:
[Server Rates]
XP: x5 | Taming: x15 | Gathering: x15 | Breeding: x15

[Player Stats Multiplier]
Oxygen: x1.0/point | Weight: x5.0/Points

[Dino Stats Multiplier]
Health: x1.0 | Weight: x3.0 | Damage: x1.0

Leveling up to 80 is really quick. This will allow you to deal with those level 150 wild dinos. After 80 it will take quite a bit of effort to reach the level 210, expect a very long journey to grind for it.

Shop :
You receive 5 points every minutes played on any map of the cluster. Given every 5 minutes to your steam account [Points balance is cluster wide] See Shop tab for more info.


Donators can obtain x2 shop points, meaning 10 points every 5 minutes played on any map of the cluster. See our webpage for more info.

-MaxPlayerLevel: 210 [105 Without Ascentions]
-MaxTAMEDDinoLevel: 450
-MaxWildDinoLevel: 150
-MaxWildTekDinoLevel: 180
-MaxWildEggSpawns: 190
-Dino can be leveled up to 88 time once it's tamed
-All engrams unlockable by level 140 [/unlockengrams][Inactive for now]

-Defeat the Ark bosses to unlock the tek engrams, or see Shop tab on the top right to buy them by using your shop points.

ARK Settings:
AutoSavePeriodMinutes=15.0 [WorldSave every 15 minutes]

MaxNumberOfPlayerInTribe=6

SupplyCratelootQualityMultiplier=x1.3
FishingLootQualityMultiplier=x2

CropGrowthSpeedMultiplier=x5
AllowUnlimitedRespecs=True [Infinite MindWipe]
DisableWeatherFog=True

LimiteTurretsRange=10000
LimitTurretsNum=100
DinoTurretDamageMiltiplier=x3

PlayerDamageMultiplier=1.0
DinoResistanceMultiplier=1.0

IncreasePvPRespawnInterval=True
IncreasePvPRespawnIntervalCheckPerios=120
IncreasePvPRespawnIntervalMultiplier=2
IncresePvPRespawnIntervalBaseAmount=30

Tribute Transfer [Dinos/Items]: 7 Days [70 Ark Data Slot]
Tribute transfer timer: [24H]
tab2.text2:
Globaly: [In game & Discord] :

- Keep chat Clean [In Global, in discord and towards the staff]
- We tolerate English and French in Global chat please keep the other languages to tribe chat.
- Take Screenshots, if bugs and no screenshots no help.

- Follow official ARK Termes of service [TOS] [No meshing, no 100% boxing in dinos, etc.]

Per Map :

- Max 2 main bases [Can be protected by Heavys and tek turret, On large base location no turret limit]
- No limit to no turret base / traps / teleports / etc.
- Spam only near your base and teleporters. / Some spam near fobs.

Cluster Wide

- 5 mains bases across the cluster is allowed [Can be protected by Heavys and tek turret, On large base location no turret limit]
- You can only claim up to 2 caves base locations per tribe.
- Do not camp Players [Preventing them to build/play] [7 days at least between major attacks]
*Note* : Admins don't know when you where attacked, if you want to enforce that 7 days let the staff know.

Tribes

- Max 6 players per tribe.
- No Alliances, its disabled. 
- Same tribe name on ALL MAP, [Also meaning you need to be in the same tribe on all maps]

Raiding

- No Cannon raiding. Screenshots/Video will results in a tribe wipe doing this [+Tribe Logs] without any notice.
- No raft/motorboat meshing raiding. Screenshots/Videos will results in a tribe wipe doing this [+Tribe Logs] without any notice.
- [You're not allowed to attack inside structures before dealing with the outside first!] [MeshBiting] [BrontoTailSwipe]
- Pick up FOBs after your done raiding so new players are able to claim the location
- Do not use fence foundations as spam for FOB and leave them, they make Admins have a very hard time cleaning them up.
- You can't have alliance members to help raid or defend.

** Abuse of this will result in a FULL/ALL structure wipe of linked tribe on the map.
No warning will be made if a Server Admin spots any of these abuse.

tab4.text1:
Every players that join the server is getting starter kits (3) of them each to be more exact.

- Level 100 Pteranodon with a saddle quality of (1)

- Metal tools (Hatchet,Pick,Pike,Sickle) with a quality of (1)

- Taming kit (Crossbow,TranqArrow,Narcotics) quality (1)

- Starter base (Stone Foundations,Walls,Ceillings,Door,Bed,Forges)

- Flak armors (Helm,Chest,Legs,Gloves,Boots) quality (1)

- Boss Unlock or Summon Kits
- More to come!
tab4.text3:
In order to keep this cluster running there is a cost coming with it here how you can make the difference by donating to it.There is multiple donator milestones possible at different prices that can give you more point per 5 minutes here is what they are. 

- Standard = 5 points per five minutes
- Donator = 10 points per five minutes
- Supporter = 15 points per five minutes
- VIP = 20 points per five minutes
- EliteVIP = 35 points per five minutes
- InsaneVIP = 50 points per five minutes
- GodVIP = 75 points per five minutes

The price list will be available on discord and those ranks give you 720 in hours time and is the temporary role. The permanant roll can be achieved and is also commulative over time.
tab4.text4: Within the ArkShopUI, Will be reserved for futhur use of Donator Ranks.

tab5.text1:
In this tab, you will be able to setup your Lethal Protection properly. Please follow these simples steps.

-Every new tribe that is joining the server are getting 10 Days of 100% Raid protection.
-After someone gets a major attack, they will receive a Raid Protection of 100% for 7 days.

-Open WorldPVP is allowed. If you loose your stuff you wont get it back. The player actually earned it.

-If your caught raiding someone during your protection shield, this one will be revoked instantly. Offline/Online, Inactive tribe doesn't manner. These 10 days are to build a base without thinking of getting raided.

Here is some simple things you need to know before putting a Lethal Protection down.

-Lethal Structure can be placed anywhere in the map thats including Caves/Obelisk/Water.
-Only 1 of that structure available per tribe and per map.
-The range of the Lethal Protection is 100 foundations (Can be adjusted in the future by the admin).
-You need a minimum of 10 structures in range in order to set it down.
-Activation time without any RaidCooldown buff is 5 minutes after the last tribe member login off. If a RaidBuff is up, it will take 60 minutes.
-The show range option will be visible 20 seconds upon activation.
-The LethalProtection bubble will be visible at all time when ORP is active, this will reveal your location (Can be changed by Admin).

-LethalProtection Settings that you should be aware of.

-There is two type of buff cooldown, PVPCooldown (WorldPVP - 30 Seconds), RaidCooldown(RaidPVP - 5 Minutes) These two type have their specific timer, when you get one or the other or both, some Items/ChatCommands/Structures might have been restricted for balances purposes.

-[LethalProtection Configurations]

-Lethal Protection Decay=10 Days.
-Damage Reduction 90% to all sources.
-Turret damages 100% (This mean X2 Damage).
-PVPWorldTimer=30 Seconds.
-RaidWorldTimer=5 Minutes.
-LethalProtection Color=NeonPink.
-InfiniteTurretAmmo=False.
-LethalProtectionStructureHP=100000. Can also be destroyed.
-PopCorning drop interval Cooldown=5 Seconds.
-StackSize=100.
-DropAll=NotAllowed.
-BlockTurretCopySettings=True.
-BlockTransmitterUse=True.
